import './content.css' import {MoreHoriz, ThumbUpOutlined, ChatBubbleOutline} from '@material-ui/icons' import {Users} from '../../dummyData' import { useState } from 'react'; export default function Content({content}) { const [like, setLike] = useState(content.like); const [disLike, setDislike] = useState(false); const [color1, setColor] = useState('blue'); const color2=String; const likeHandler=()=>{ color2='white' setLike(disLike ? like-1:like+1) setColor(disLike ? color2:color1) setDislike(!disLike) } console.log(color1); return (
u.id===content?.userId)[0].profilePicture} alt="" className="leftProfile" /> {Users.filter((u)=>u.id===content?.userId)[0].username} {content.date}
{content?.desc}
{/* */} {like}
{content.comment} Komentar
Suka
Komentar
) }
